solution_line_template: He repeats this for {num_years} years, meaning he gets {num_years}*{trains_per_year} =<<{num_years}*{trains_per_year}={trains_after_years}>>{trains_after_years} trains.

When this number is doubled by his parents, it becomes {trains_after_years}*{multiplier_double}= <<{trains_after_years}*{multiplier_double}={trains_doubled_by_parents}>>{trains_doubled_by_parents} trains.

Since he already had {trains_after_years} model trains, his total becomes {trains_after_years}+{trains_doubled_by_parents}= <<{trains_after_years}+{trains_doubled_by_parents}={total_trains}>>{total_trains} trains.
